Package com.msasc.lib.task

Class Task

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.task.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Callable<Void>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SampleTask, SLTrainer
public abstract class Task extends Object implements Runnable, Callable<Void>
A task aimed to be executed in a task pool. Implements Callable to allow submissions to the Pool, and Runnable to allow executions using any thread.
Author:
Miquel Sas
